title: Horizon aims to investigate the application of adaptive intelligence in dynamic workflows by developing a system that adapts to user needs, offering contextual support, automation, and insight generation.
summary: Horizon aims to investigate the application of adaptive intelligence in dynamic workflows by developing a system that adapts to user needs, offering contextual support, automation, and insight generation.
